title: Thanos got sick of the balance of League and decided to fix it himself.
body:
( **Warning**: **Possible Infinity Wars spoilers. If you have not watched it and plan to, continue at your own risk. Not sure how spoilery this is, but you have been warned regardless**.)

Thanos decided to take the balance of league into his own hands.

 https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/333012091051180033/483028552514666517/marvel-avengers-infinity-war-thanos-sixth-scale-figure-hot-toys-903429-15.jpg

Half of the champs have been Erased from the game. The other half has been spared.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/333012091051180033/483028566661922827/ThanosLeague.jpg

Was your main erased? What was their last words?
Was your main spared? How did they react to the people disappearing around them? 

> Disclaimer- All champions were split into two groups using a [Random Team Generator](https://www.randomlists.com/team-generator) to avoid bias and to keep the things balanced, as all things should be.

replies.body:
{{champion:84}} Shen... I never would have thought if we joined forces again, we could ever lose.
{{champion:238}} Agreed. What happened?!? Why did you falter?!? We had him, and you hesitated! Why?!?
{{champion:98}} Killing him now would have only made things worse. The universe would have punished us dearly.
{{champion:238}} Fool!
{{champion:84}} Again, you and your antiquated sense of morality! *This* is why madmen roam Ionia!
{{champion:202}} My dear, I take offense to that. The defeat is crushing enough as is.
{{champion:39}} ...Eye of Twilight...
*Irelia stares at her hands as they dissolve into dust*
{{champion:84}} What's happening to her? Shen? Answer me! 
{{champion:98}} Lady Irelia... close your eyes.
{{champion:39}} What... what is happening to me...?
*Irelia dissolves into dust*
{{champion:84}} What...?
*Akali looks around, watching on in horror*
{{champion:238}} What... is this sorcery?!?
*The group turn to Zed, whose arms are turning into dust. He furiously tries to swing away the dust, but only succeeds in scattering his own deteriorating remains.*
{{champion:98}} At ease, Zed.
{{champion:238}} I... I cannot...
*Zed deteriorates into dust*
{{champion:202}} Two... do I see a pattern?
{{champion:84}} Hush! This is no time for your sick jokes!
*Akali sees that Jhin's gun arm is crumbling*
{{champion:202}} Number three I may be... but history will remember me.
*Jhin disappears into a scattered breeze of dust. Akali's arm follows suit.*
{{champion:84}} Why did you hesitate, Shen? Why did you stay your hand?
{{champion:98}} ...Forgive me.
*Akali's head begins deteriorating*
{{champion:84}} I don't want to die...
*Shen watches as Akali disappears as quickly as the others, erased from existence*
{{champion:98}} ...
*Shen sits there in grief, unmoving as the silence in the air grows heavy. Kennen walks up and sits next to him heavily.*
{{champion:85}} Shen, wh... what happened...?
*Shen removes his mask and tosses it aside. He runs his hands through his hair and cradles his head before looking out at the crimson horizon.*
{{champion:98}} We played god. And we paid the price.
Jhin wasn't four, reported.

{{champion:78}}: "Here, Prince Jarvan, I'm positive you're the hero."
{{champion:59}}: _disintegrates_
{{champion:78}}: "..."
{{champion:78}}: "**WHY DOES THIS KEEP HAPPENING TO ME?!?!**"

{{champion:201}} erased ? what blasphemy is this? this must be purged ! 
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Obviously all the people spared were those who stood behind Braum.

{{champion:201}}: "_Braum… Is here..._"

https://i.giphy.com/media/26FPImXfDlv4AFbBC/giphy.webp

" _Braum.... Was HERE...!_ "

Take a good rest, mustache man. {{sticker:cass-cry}}

{{champion:498}}: _Holding Rakan's hand as it begins to fade, tears streaming down her face_ "Damn it Rakan, I said stick to the plan!"

{{champion:497}}: _Smiling at her_ "Aaaaaw, but if I did that you'd be dead, and I'd look lame; and Rakan don't let his lover die, or look lame!"

{{champion:498}}: _Crying more_ "But, you'd make it without me, and you know it, I, I can't..." _Breaks down into tears, dust filling her empty palms_

{{champion:497}}: _Wiping, but mostly absorbing the tears through the disintegrating stump that soon won't be his arm_ "Don't cry now, I know you'll make it, you're a tough, smart, and beautiful leader of a rebellion." _As oblivion crawled up his body he reached towards his back with his mouth, and yanked one of the last bits of feathers from his cloak, offering it to her from his mouth_ "Here, for you, my love."

{{champion:498}}: _Taking it, but looking back at Rakan with her tear glistened gaze_ "But, It'll just go with you..."

{{champion:497}}: _He shrugs with the stumps of his arms_ "Well, you can keep the dust then, a piece of me to light up your world whenever things get dark." _He winked at her._ "Besides, it's the thought that counts right?"

{{champion:498}}: _She manages a smile, though with her tears returning it began to bend with the weight of her sorrow; but held thanks to Rakan's contagious carefree attitude_ "Yah... it is"_She got close to him_ "I love you Rakan." _She gave him one last kiss_

{{champion:497}}: "I know." _He responded, giving her his final kiss, before only dust lined her lips_

{{champion:498}}: _She took a deep breath as Rakan faded away, as the dust filtered away, the soft bristling of a feather quivered in her palm. She looked, and the feather Rakan plucked for her was still there, with her, even after Rakan faded. With a deep breath she nestled it into her hair, and stood up, looking to the Horizon, she needed to find any survivors, rally the forces, and then, she needed to go kick some purple space grape ass..._

_For Rakan._
You spared brand and kai`sa, and killed galio and rek`sai :c

Yea, I was sad to see that myself, but I made a rule for myself that I would not mess with the results and keep 100% unbias to who was spared and erased.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

{{champion:161}} was spared and Yasuo, Akali, and Zed were erased.

Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.

You killed death{{champion:203}} now Thanos will never get lucky.
Warning what your about to read may cause feels, any demons who feed on suffering ~~Evelynn~~ rip may want to leave.
{{champion:33}} goes to take a bite of a juicy kmiros in his cave after a busy day armadilloing around when he stumbles.
{{champion:33}} seems confused a goes to powerball away when his legs fail him and dissolve into dust, he collapses helplessly on his side. As his body disintegrates and his spirit leaves this world the people of shurima hear faint words carried by the cool evening breeze "Ok".

Cue GoT last of the giant with armidillos instead.
{{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

I just realised aatrox survived and was robbed of his chance at vengeance (and most special interaction) against like all of targonians and demi-gods.
His next AA meeting is going to be eventful, poor guy.
Tryndamirs ult must have been on cooldown.
{{champion:23}} _ults_

{{champion:2}} What did you do? WHAT DID YOU DO?!
*Thanos teleports away*
He looks around, sees Twitch walking closer.
{{champion:29}}  Hey, meathead? I... *He turns to dust.*
{{champion:2}} What's happening?
The sky is rumbling with lightning, like the world is being hollowed out.
{{champion:107}} Get up, Leona. This is no place to die." *turns to dust*
{{champion:89}} She looks at her hand as the fur dissolves. Fear seeps is.
{{champion:119}} Darius, we gotta get outta here!
{{champion:122}} Brother... *Darius' hair dissolves, together with his legs.*
*Draven tries to hold him*
{{champion:119}} No..not you, bro. No..
{{champion:122}} I'm sorry...i couldn't be a better..*he dissolves*
*Draven holds his arms against his face*
{{champion:2}} What in the hells is going on?
{{champion:245}} Olaf...i don't feel so good.
*He clutches onto his chest. Trying to use his timewinder but it's futile. The device is still broken from the battle.*
{{champion:245}} I don't wanna go. Please. I'm not ready.
{{champion:2}} You're alright.
{{champion:245}} Please...i'm sorry.. *Olaf holds him as his face crumbles into dust before him.*
*He looks around, only but a few silhouettes still moving around, untouched by this new attack*
*Everything has gone silent.*



-------------------------------------------------

{{champion:80}} "What's going on?"
Even the aspect of War could not foresee an attack on this scale.
{{champion:48}} *growls* "Pantheoon?!" Trundle looks around in panic, unsettled by an invisible enemy.
Raising his spear, Pantheon contacts their last hope for either survival or vengeance.
The sky splits between the beam of Targon.
*He feels his body dissolving upwards towards the spear.*
{{champion:80}} "I should have been a ba..."


The camera pans towards the sky. A rumbling noise echoes out from the Beyond. A last ditch effort to sate an insatiable hunger.

Unparalleled in their destructive capabilities...
They are coming.

he'd be very happy. cuz there are less trespassers he has to deal with

{{champion:421}}  REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEeeeeeee e e e e ....e....e..................................

How I think some champion disintegrations would go, assuming those were in a group after they lost to thanos.

{{champion:157}} We lost...
{{champion:126}} What do we do now...half of all life will die now- *Jayce could not finish his sentence before he suddenly realized he could not feel his left arm anyome, it turned to dust, and his disintegration was slowly covering him* 
{{champion:41}} Easy there, boy. It will be alright.
{{champion:126}} Aw ma-...*Jayce could not finish before he turned to dust*
{{champion:142}} *Zoe, having for once not been in her playful mood, glanced around and tried to contemplate how doomsday as she knew it was happening and she failed to prevent it*
{{champion:101}} *Xerath had noticed he was disintegrating too, starting with his arcanic feet, growing up to his head*
{{champion:268}} Old friend...*Azir muttered as he watched Xerath disappear, then noticed he too was starting to turn to dust, managing his last words before turning to dust* I failed you in life, forgive me in death...
{{champion:157}} Gangplank...Something is happening to me... *Yasuo started walking forward but tripped over his feet since they were turning to dust*
{{champion:41}} *The Grumpy pirate turned to the unforgiven and caught him as he stumbled forward, laying him down* it will be alright, you will be alright.
{{champion:157}} Im sorry...Im sorry, Yone *Yasuo managed to whisper before he turned to dust. Gangplank who was holding him felt his hands sink through the now dusty body, clapping into the ground before he too was slowly turning to dust*
{{champion:41}} ah motherfu- *Were his last words*
{{champion:142}} *Zoe looked around as she witnessed everyone she fought besides turn to dust then felt the omnious fear of death wash over her consciousness like a tidal wave and she realized she was next. She looked down to her hands and started to pulverize too. She looked up to the heavens and whispered* I never wanted this to happen...*Before she too was only dust in the wind, and with her, all were gone*

A loud, echoed boom was heard past the atmosphere.

Viktor turns his head towards the source of the noise.

{{champion:112}} _Analysis?_

No information can be taken from his HUD, which is now a flickering mess of orange static.

Heavy panting could be heard from his six.

{{champion:126}} _Viktor, what happened? What was that?_

{{champion:112}} _Unsure. Scan unsuccessful, no readings can be taken._

Sparks flew from where his third arm once was.

Jayce rests his hammer on the ground, handle up.

{{champion:53}} **_CREATOR?_**

Viktor and Jayce turn their heads towards the golem. Blitzcrank raises his hand, which is already disintegrating. The metal man approaches his dying creation. He knows exactly what is happening, and what is to come.

{{champion:53}} **_WHAT IS HAPPENING?_**

Viktor rests his human hand on the smooth metal shoulder of Blitzcrank.

{{champion:112}} _Do not fear, my creation._

The shoulder disintegrates under his hand, and the cyborg falls to the ground.

{{champion:53}}** _CREATOR, I DO NOT WanT To g-_**

Viktor watched as his creation, The Great Steam Golem, turned from solid metal to dust. He closed his human eye.

{{champion:126}} _Vik...tor?_

Viktor quickly stood up and spun around to see Jayce staring at his left hand in horror. It was slowly being blown away piece by piece in the light breeze, and was continuing up his arm.

He quickly marches towards the disappearing hero.

{{champion:112}} _Do not panic. You will be of utmost condition._

He had no choice but to lie.

Jayce fell into Viktor's arms, the disintegration now eating away at his legs. His voice was trembling.

{{champion:126}} _Will I be okay?_

{{champion:112}} _As I said. You will be of utmost condition in very short time._

Jayce formed a shaky smile.

{{champion:126}} _I always knew that yo-_

The great Mercury Hammer fell to the ground with a loud thud.

The Defender of Tomorrow has vanished.

The Machine Herald held the remains of his former rival in the palm of his steel hand, and exhaled.

He turned towards the still glowing core of the Mercury Hammer.

If he could smile, he would.

{{champion:112}} _As I said._

{{champion:238}} : Balance is weakness

_disintegrates away_

{{champion:99}} : Brother... W-what's going on?

_Lux sees her hands are dissolving into dust._

{{champion:86}} : Oh no.... not you...

_Lux runs up, attempting to hug her brother with her rapidly dissolving arms, only succeeding in draping his shoulders in dust. Garen returns the favor._

{{champion:99}} : I have to tell you. I have to tell you before I go...

{{champion:86}} : What?

{{champion:99}} : I-I have...

_But it's too late. Her head vanishes, and the remainder of her does as well. Garen is left just staring at the dust in his hands that once constituted his sister's being. He falls to his knees and hangs his head in defeat._

****

{{champion:55}} : Cassie... Cassie...

{{champion:69}} : Sister?

_Cassiopeia looks and sees her older sister drop her knifes as her hands turn to dust. Katarina suddenly falls over, but Cassie comes up and catches her in her arms. Katarina looks at her sister sadly._

{{champion:55}} : I guess... I'll be seeing Daddy first.

{{champion:69}} : Don't say that, sis. I need you. Noxus needs you!

_Cassieopeia's pleadings avail her nothing as her sister dissolves in her arms. Cassieopeia looks up at Swain as she clenches the dust that formerly was her sister in her fists._

{{champion:50}} : Cass, there was no other way.

Interesting to note:

I'm pretty glad how it turned out, Champs I like on both sides but that's only fair.
